content: equinox created by lisa overby asymmetrical triangle shawl knit with 1 skein of fingering weight yarn this easy pattern is a mixture of relaxing garter stich and simple eyelets ©2020 yarn twisters 1 equinox materials & info abbreviations yarn 1 skein yarn twisters sw sock yarn 380m 415 bobble - bind off yards /100 g 75% superwash merino 25% nylon sam- co - cast on ple knit in colourway make it blue make it pink k - knit gauge 20 sts by 48 row equal 4 by 4 in garter be- fore blocking k2tog - knit 2 together insert needle into the next 2 sts knit the 2 sts together as one 1 st decreased needles 3 75mm us 5 32 circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge kfb - knit into the front of the stitch leaving on the notions darning needle left hand needle knit into the back of the same stitch finished size centre depth 14 35 5 cm wingspan dropping the stitch off the left hand needle 1 stitch 55 140 cm increased lhn - left hand needle p - purl rhn - right hand needle rs - right side st/sts - stitch/stitches ws - wrong side yo - yarnover 1 st increased pattern instructions set up row 4 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 32 sts co 3 sts row 5 to 20 repeat row 1 and 2 of garter section row 1 kfb kfb k1 5 sts eight times 40 sts row 2 k1 k2tog kfb k1 row 21 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 row 3 k1 kfb k to end 6 sts row 22 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 41 sts garter section row 23 to 38 repeat row 1 and 2 of garter section eight times 49 sts row 1 rs k1 k2tog k to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 39 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 2 ws kfb k to end 1 st increased row 40 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 50 sts repeat row 1 and 2 twenty-three more times 30 sts row 41 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 main section row 42 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 51 sts row 1 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 row 43 to 82 repeat row 1 and 2 of garter section twenty times 71 sts row 2 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 31 sts row 83 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 3 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 84 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 72 sts ©2020 yarn twisters 2 equinox pattern instructions cont d row 85 k1 k2tog yo k2tog to last 3 sts k1 kfb k1 row 184 kfb p to last 2 sts k2 122 sts row 86 kfb p to
